app.name: WiiU Video Mode Changer
app.long_description: You can change between NTSC and PAL, all the different ports hdmi, composite, s-video, scart and component and change the resolution 576i, 480i, 720p, ... to whatever you want, I did not include any safety guards for invalid settings so keep that in mind you wont for example get composite to go to 720p etc..
